name: TravelVibesPR
content: A personalized travel advisor built using MongoDB, Express, React, and NodeJS.  Users can create an account, add vibes and will see a customized reccomendation based on their vibe.

name: Inventory Management Tool
content: A simple stock keeping tool with an intuitive user interface built using Django and Bootstrap. It allows users to add, edit, and delete items from their inventory.

name: Scheduler
content: A schedule automation tool built using Python and Tkinter. It automatically generates a schedule based on guide availability.

name: AI Image Generator
content: Currently in progress. This project will use machine learning to generate images based on user input using JavaScript.
